title: Green engineering: simple solutions to water pollution
creator_credit: Film Victoria, Environment Protection Authority and Stephen Cozens
brief_description: Using the Yarra River as an example, this video shows how sediment pollution of rivers can be reduced by using green engineering and how silt traps at building sites can be useful on eroded sites.
title_for_label: Green engineering: simple solutions to water pollution
